item.description:
The organizer of the Boston Ethnic Dining Meetup (Al) contacted me wanting to know if our group would be interested in a group event. I said, of course!

We will be visiting Boston's Italian North End for some authentic cuisine at Dom's Restaurant (www.domsboston.com). Dinner will be family style, and we will ask everyone to pay a set price ($38 including tax and tip), which includes appetizers and the main course. PLEASE BRING CASH, as we get a discount for cash only.

Here's the menu we have selected:

Appetizers: salad and mozzarella with proscuitto and tomatoes
Main courses: fish with puttanesca sauce, chicken Sienese, veal Parmagiana, and ravioli.

They also have a good wine list, and excellent desserts can be found at any number of Italian bakeries in the area.

A few of us will be heading to Boston earlier that day to enjoy the city for a bit before dinner. If you are interested in this, please let me know in your RSVP.

**PLEASE RSVP YOUR FINAL RESPONSE BY TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 5 so that we can make the appropriate reservation.**

Dom's has been around for over 30 years and has received excellent reviews from Zagat's.

For more information, see http://www.domsboston...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Italy--Dom's in BOSTON's North End
